intermediate materials - woolstok bundle 100% fine highland wool 5g/12yds 21 mini hanks - size 8 5mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - size 8 5mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge - stitch marker - tapestry needle size - one finished measurements - circumference 19½ - height 8½ winter wonderland hat no 202138 gauge design by mary pranica pattern - in stockinette stitch 18 sts and 28 row = 4 blocked the weather outside is frightful but knitting this hat is delightful using just one holiday frost bundle this winter abbreviations wonderland hat will keep you warm on those chilly days co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together p purl pm place marker rem remaining repeat repeat round s round s st s stitch es complimentary pattern blue sky fibers 11 9 11 8 7 6 4 3 2 1 chart a chart b 18 36 17 35 16 34 15 33 14 32 13 31 12 30 11 29 10 28 9 27 8 26 7 25 6 24 5 23 4 22 3 21 2 20 1 1 19 18 * repeat the directions between the asterisks as 8-st repeat 17 many times as indicated 16 chart a key 15 a special methods 14 b 13 stranded color c 12 a method of color knitting in which two or more yarns are d 11 worked at the same time with yarns not in use stranded e 10 loosely across the wrong side of the piece 9 8 7 notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no longer fit comfortably on circular needle 6 5 hat 4 3 2 with a co 88 sts pm and join to work in the round being 1 careful not to twist sts rnds 1-5 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round 11-st repeat round 6 k chart b key work chart a once a work chart b once c cut yarn leaving 8 tail thread through rem sts and pull to close d f finishing g weave in ends block as desired g k2tog no stitches care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid water using a mild soap do not twist shape and p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2021 this pattern is dry flat on a towel store your little treasure neatly copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this folded after all it may be a family heirloom pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy
